resources.string: Made with love by the IIP Team

Privacy is one of the important aspect of an individual. In today's world, rapid advancements in technology have also lead to lot of discrepancy of data and its misuse has become quite frequent nowadays.
We pledge to prevent the misuse of you data in any form, your data is in safe hands.
I thereby declare that all the data inputted by me in the app is true to my ability, I would be responsible for the actions that I pertake after results, Wellness Meter team would not held guilty under any law.
I also declare that :
